Elementarium:Hover.NAME: Hover
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes #b{0}% less damage from attacks.

Elementarium:EnergyLimit.NAME: Energy Limit
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b1 less card at the start of each turn. Start with at most #b3 energy each turn.

Elementarium:TarBody.NAME: Tar Body
DESCRIPTIONS: When this enemy takes attack damage, add a #yTar to your deck.

Elementarium:MidasAura.NAME: Midas Aura
DESCRIPTIONS: When you use an upgraded attack, skill, or power, #yExhaust it and add a Gilded Strike, Gilded Defend, or Gilded Essence to your deck.

Elementarium:Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce all debuffs by #b{0} at the end of each turn.
Wears off after this turn.

Elementarium:FlourishingFlame.NAME: Flourishing Flame
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a card that targets multiple enemies, this enemy gains #b{0} #yStrength.

Elementarium:SummoningPortal.NAME: Summoning Portal
DESCRIPTIONS: Summons elementals each turn up to a limit of #b{0} active. Invulnerable and won't attack until it has summoned #b{1} more elementals.

Elementarium:Sorrow.NAME: Sorrow
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, gains #b{0} #yStrength at end of turn if it is the only {1}.

Elementarium:Crumbling.NAME: Crumbling
DESCRIPTIONS: Dies in #b{0} turns. When this dies to #yCrumbling, {1} loses #b{2} #yStrength.
Dies in #b1 turn. When this dies to #yCrumbling, {0} loses #b{1} #yStrength.

Elementarium:Delicate.NAME: Delicate
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time this takes unblocked attack damage each turn, it loses #b{0} #yStrength.

Elementarium:BurningDisdain.NAME: Burning Disdain
DESCRIPTIONS: The third attack played each turn causes this to gain #b{0} #yStrength. Attacks played so far this turn: #b{1}.

Elementarium:FreezingContempt.NAME: Freezing Contempt
DESCRIPTIONS: The third skill played each turn causes this to gain #b{0} #yStrength. Skills played so far this turn: #b{1}.

Elementarium:BurningClaws.NAME: Burning Claws
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive attack damage from this enemy, add a #yBurn into your discard pile.

Elementarium:FreezingClaws.NAME: Freezing Claws
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive attack damage from this enemy, it gains #b{0} #yMetallicize.

Elementarium:PhoenixRebirth.NAME: Phoenix's Rebirth
DESCRIPTIONS: When brought to half HP, becomes invulnerable. At the end of that turn, removes all debuffs, loses this, and uses a special ability.

Elementarium:DelayedVulnerable.NAME: Delayed Vulnerable
DESCRIPTIONS: Applies #yVulnerable at the start of your turn.

Elementarium:DurableMinion.NAME: Durable Minion
DESCRIPTIONS: This minion will not abandon combat when its leader is defeated.

Elementarium:VoidPressure.NAME: Void Pressure
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is #yExhausted or you play a power, take #b{0} damage. Exhaust a random card in your hand that isn't a Status, a Curse, or Ethereal at the end of your turn.

Elementarium:GoldenBulwark.NAME: Golden Bulwark
DESCRIPTIONS: Gains #b1 block at the start of combat for every #b{0} gold you have (rounded up).

Elementarium:FierceWinds.NAME: FierceWinds
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an attack, take #b{0} damage.
